Package org.pragmaticminds.crunch.execution

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventSink<T extends Serializable>
    Callback Interface to be used in conjunction with crunch-core.
    MergeFunction<T extends Serializable,R extends Serializable>
    Interface for implementation of merge functions for pipelines
    MRecordSource
    Source for MRecordSource can be finite or infinite.
    SortFunction<I extends Serializable,T extends Serializable>
    This interface describes the structure for a timestamp based sort function.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMRecordSource
    Abstract implementation of MRecordSource which overrides init and close with empty methods.
    CrunchExecutor
    Executor that runs a EvaluationPipeline.
    EventSinkContext<T extends Serializable>
    This is an EvaluationContext which forwards all the Events it receives to a EventSink callback.
    MRecordSources
    Static Util Method to generate MRecordSources from different simple java structures like List or Iterator.
    NoOpSink
    Sink that does Nothing.
    SortGraphFlow<T extends MRecord>
    Realizes the sorting of incoming records by timestamps in a defined sort window.
    TimestampSortFunction<T extends Serializable>
    This class implements the SortFunction interface based on Long type timestamps.
    UntypedValuesMergeFunction
    This class implements the interface MergeFunction.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MRecordSource.Kind
    Specifies the Kind of this MRecordSource.
